remarks.para: The _ftime function gets the current local time and stores it in the structure pointed to by timeptr. The _timeb structure is defined in time.h. It contains four fields:

tr.td: Nonzero if daylight savings time is currently in effect for the local time zone.
Fraction of a second in milliseconds.
Time in seconds since midnight (00:00:00), January 1, 1970, coordinated universal time (UTC).
Difference in minutes, moving westward, between UTC and local time.
